description: This json file contains the corrections for the deepJet, particleNet, robustParticleTransformer AK4 jet taggers for the 2022_Summer22 campaign. This file contains only the fixedWP SFs from the individual b-jet SF methods.

corrections.name: deepJet_kinfit
corrections.description: For the working point correction multiple different uncertainty schemes are provided. If only one year is analyzed, the 'up' and 'down' systematics can be used. If multiple data taking eras are analyzed, 'up/down_correlated' and 'up/down_uncorrelated' systematics are provided to be used instead of the 'up/down' ones, which are supposed to be correlated/decorrelated between the different data years.
